Name: Rebels - Under the Spell of Magic (Chapter 3)
About the game: The game is a linear visual novel. It has a few choices, but they do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide different content to the reader. This is a continuation of Chapter 2. It is highly recommended to play through the other chapters first, before starting this one. Join Folken as he starts his first adventure in a world that is reigned by magic. Dive into the complex world of this fantasy story and discover creatures, lore, abilities and a lot of characters with unique personalities. There are 44 CG's to unlock. A single playthrough takes about 5 hours. Story After successfully escaping the prison, Folken and Meta are granted a second chance. But what will they do with it? Things are calming down, but they need a plan on what to do next. Although, not everything is as peaceful as it seems.
